short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows communication between Webconnector and Smartcard devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please install also the native host for communication with the devices.

https://plugin.webconnect.pro/extension-latest.exe
